name: Spaceship Thingy
description:
Just a little fun game I made on the side with GDevelop. I don't know what I was doing but I just made this. Download if you want and I'm still trying to get on Linux but yea it's a really bad game. I made this in like a few hours and I'm still working on it for some reason but if you wanna play it, play it :))

I'm done with this game and I'm working on something else so you won't see any more updates. It's launched ;p

Enjoy the "game"...?!
